description: We have three subsidary companies, one of which, Transport Trading Limited, has several subsidiaries of its own

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We are a statutory corporation regulated under local government finance rules. We are governed by the Greater London Authority Act and have three subsidiary companies incorporated under the Companies Act 2006."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Our subsidiary companies are:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["London Transport Insurance (Guernsey) Limited","TfL Trustee Company Limited","Transport Trading Limited"]}
View an organisational chart showing the relationship between our subsidiary companies, and a list of the directors of our subsidiary companies.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"TfL subsidiary company structure","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tfl-subsidiary-organisation-january-2019.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 27KB","image":{}},{"title":"Directors of TfL subsidiary companies","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tfl-subsidiary-directors-november-2018.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 51KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Transport Trading Limited companies"}
Transport Trading Limited also has a number of subsidiary companies. These are detailed below in alphabetical order.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"City Airport Rail Enterprises Limited"}

Company No: 04411523
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Crossrail Limited"}
The company appointed to procure and manage the implementation of the Crossrail project.

Company No: 04212657
Place of registration: England
Registered office: 25 Canada Square, Canary Wharf, London E14 5LQ
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Docklands Light Railway Limited"}
Owns the land on which the Docklands Light Railway is built and is responsible for the operation of the railway.

Company No: 02052677
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Buses Limited"}
Responsible for Dial-a-Ride, which provides door-to-door transport for disabled people.

Company No: 01900906
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Bus Services Limited"}

Responsible for regulating the London bus network, including planning bus routes and setting bus service levels. The company also monitors service quality. It is responsible for providing bus infrastructure and for certain support services regarding the bus network.

Company No: 03914787
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Dial-a-Ride Limited"}
Incorporated in 1991 as a contingency measure, should it have become necessary for certain services to be operated directly; it has never traded.

Company No: 02602192
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London River Services Limited"}
Operates and manages eight piers on the River Thames. Licenses boat services using those piers and subsidises multi-stop commuter services provided by a private operator.

Company No: 03485723
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Transport Insurance (Guernsey) Limited"}
An insurance company based in Guernsey that provides insurance services to us, our subsidiaries and some of our contractors.

Company No: 28442
Place of registration: Guernsey
Registered office: 4th Floor, The Albany, South Esplanade, St Peter Port, Guernsey
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Transport Museum Limited"}
The company was incorporated in 2008 and has charitable status. It runs the London Transport Museum in Covent Garden.

Company No: 06495761
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered Office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Transport Museum (Trading) Limited"}
The trading company of the London Transport Museum was established to undertake activities designed to benefit the museum, such as the museum shop.

Company No: 06527755
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered Office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Underground Limited"}
Responsible for operating the London Underground train network and owns (in whole or in part) more than 250 stations.

Company No: 01900907
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"LUL Nominee BCV Limited"}
Responsible for delivering the maintenance and refurbishment activities relating to Bakerloo, Central and Victoria lines.

Company No: 06221959
Place of registration: UK
Registered Office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"LUL Nominee SSL Limited"}
Responsible for delivering the maintenance and refurbishment activities relating to the sub-surface lines: District, Circle, Metropolitan, Northern, Hammersmith & City.

Company No: 06242508
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered Office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Rail for London (Infrastructure) Limited"}
A wholly owned subsidiary of Transport Trading Ltd.  It will be the Infrastructure Manager for the Elizabeth line central operating section and will grant access to rail operators.

Company No: 09366341
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered Office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Rail for London Limited"}
A wholly owned subsidiary of Transport Trading Ltd. It will carry out the infrastructure upgrade for the North London line and enter into a concession agreement for the London Rail Concession.

Company No: 05965930
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered Office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"TfL Trustee Company Limited"}
Trustee of the TfL Pension Fund.

Company No: 02338675
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Tramtrack Croydon Limited"}
Responsible for the running and operation of the tram service in and around the Croydon area.

Company No: 03092613
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered Office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Transport Trading Limited"}

The holding company for all the operating transport companies owned by us. It also carries out certain other trading activities. It receives the revenues from the sales of Travelcards in connection with all forms of transport operated by us. By law, we cannot carry out certain activities except through a limited liability company which is a subsidiary of ours or which we formed or joined with others in forming.

Company No: 03914810
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"UKTram Limited"}

This is an associate company of London Bus Services Limited (LBSL). It is limited by guarantee and owned in equal shares by LBSL, the Confederation of Passenger Transport UK, PTEG Ltd and the Light Rapid Transit Forum.

The main purpose of UKTram Ltd is to represent the UK tramway industry in dealing with government and statutory bodies in developing a coordinated and structured approach to regulation, procurement and standardisation within the industry.

Company No: 05554196
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: Centro, 16 Summer Lane, Birmingham B19 3SD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Transport for London Finance Limited"}

Incorporated in November 2008 as a wholly owned subsidiary of Transport Trading Ltd. Its principal purpose is to enter into certain financial transactions on behalf of members of our group where appropriate.

Company No: 06745516
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"TTL Blackhorse Road Properties Limited"}

Company No: 11121664

Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"TTL Earl's Court Properties Limited"}

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"TTL Kidbrooke Properties Limited"}

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"TTL Landmark Court Properties Limited"}

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"TTL Properties Limited"}

Company No: 08961151

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"TTL Southwark Properties Limited"}

Company No: 08212651
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Tube Lines Limited"}
Provides maintenance services on the Jubilee, Northern and Piccadilly lines.

Company No: 03923425
Place of registration: England and Wales
Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Tube Lines Pension Scheme Trustees Limited"}

Company No: 05024749

Registered office: 55 Broadway, London SW1H 0BD

Operates Victoria Coach Station, which is responsible for providing an arrival and departures facility for coaches in London.
